message.body: Hey Gabi it's Talia, just got your email! Id love to join tmrw though usually they don't offer student tickets on the Saturday concerts. With my juilliard card I can get two tickets $15 each so I can try tmrw and see if they do.
My teacher is the principal bass there so I can also try to see if he has extra, but since it's last minute I doubt it.
Cool, that would be great! If not we should meet up
Absolutely! I'll let u know about the Phil tmrw morning. If I don't text u before 2 remind me!
They had some last week for today but now they don't. I texted my teacher we'll see if he answers..

Hey sooo he's not getting back to me which means he prob doesn't. Also my friend asked me to help her out tonight and babysit her kids. She'll prob be back around 10 but if it's too late we can hang tmrw maybe?
I'm not sure what my plans are but after 10 could possibly work, where will you be?
72nd and broadway. I'll let u know when I get out hopefully not too late
Im gonna go with my friends to a movie at 945, if you get out in time you should join us. Otherwise would you wanna get breakfast?
I doubt I'll get out on time. But yeah for tmrw.. Where in nyc are you staying?
And when does the march starts?
